LanguageData.Satellite.Building_SatelliteCollector.Dr: Drop pods have arrived from orbit.
LanguageData.Satellite.Building_SatelliteCollector.Ca: No landing zones found. Resource transport from orbit is not possible. Set up landing beacons.
LanguageData.Satellite.Building_Novax.PowerDesc: Enabling energy reception will disable this function for other buildings. This "Novax" will receive energy from all satellites configured for it.
LanguageData.Satellite.Satellite.SatelliteDestroyed: Satellite {0} destroyed due to critical damage.
LanguageData.Satellite.Satellite.StartLanding: Satellite {0} begins landing at the spaceport.
LanguageData.Satellite.WindowNovax.IsNotCommunicator: Unable to contact anyone. Communicator is absent in the satellite's structure.
LanguageData.Satellite.WindowNovax.NullSpaceships: No spaceships to establish communication with.
LanguageData.Satellite.CompSatelliteController.Landin: Landing is only possible on a prepared spaceport with landing beacons.
LanguageData.Satellite.CompSatelliteController.CantLa: Landing is not possible without a landing module.
LanguageData.Satellite.CompSatelliteController.Satell: Directed satellite crash for damage infliction.
LanguageData.Satellite.IncidentWorker_SpaceshipArriva: {0} is near your orbit. It seems to belong to ancient origins and is willing to trade with you. It will stay in orbit for a day before continuing its journey.
LanguageData.Satellite.IncidentWorker_SatelliteDamage: Satellite {0} has sustained damage due to collision with space debris. Current health: {1}. It is recommended to land the satellite for repairs.
LanguageData.Satellite.Spaceship.SpaceshipLeave: {0} leaves orbit and continues its journey.
LanguageData.Satellite.SatelliteUtility.LowGeneration: The satellite cannot take off with a negative energy generation coefficient.
LanguageData.Satellite.SatelliteUtility.SizeFail: The satellite cannot exceed a size of {0} cells in all directions.
LanguageData.Satellite.SatelliteUtility.FoodFail: A crewed satellite cannot take off with insufficient food.
LanguageData.Satellite.CompSatelliteController.Attack: The satellite will perform an attack on the specified area using all available weapons, if it has enough energy and it's feasible.
